headers.value: default-src 'self' https:; connect-src 'self' https://*.walletconnect.org wss://*.walletconnect.org https://pulse.walletconnect.org https://cloud.reown.com; frame-src 'self' https://*.walletconnect.org; img-src 'self' data: https:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://*.walletconnect.org; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https:;
